modName: Batch file for Skill books and Tomes
summary:
Batch file for use in the console... adds all skill books (5 for each skill) and all spell tomes
I used the guide book as a reference, so if it isn\'t in the guide it won\'t be in the batch =]
descriptionHtml:
I took inspiration form the ingreget batch file, and decided to make this one for books... Ingreget located here : http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=398

Steps:
1: Place skillbooks.txt into your Skyrim directory
(\"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\steamapps\\common\\skyrim\")

2: Press tilde (~) to open console

3: Type \"bat skillbooks\" w/o quotes

This adds all skill books (5 for each skill) and all spell tomes
I used the guide book as a reference, so if it isn\'t in the guide it won\'t be in the batch =]

Updated 12/4/11 to include 3 missing Spell Tomes
author: reido
